meanings.definition: To be mutually reliant on each other for support or existence.
meanings.sent1: The plants in the ecosystem interdepended on each other for survival.
meanings.sent2: The success of the team interdepended on everyone working together.
meanings.sent3: The two best friends interdepended on each other for advice and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The gears in the clock interdepended like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The villages interdepended on the river for water and fish.

meanings.definition: Depending on each other for mutual benefit or success.
meanings.sent1: The interdepended businesses collaborated to achieve greater success.
meanings.sent2: The interdepended relationship between the two countries was strong.
meanings.sent3: The interdepended tasks were completed efficiently by the team.
meanings.sent4: The interdepended goals of the project were achieved through teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The interdepended communities supported each other during tough times.
